creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Taoist priest robe of embroidered blue satin. Main design of flowers, clouds, bats, and good luck characters in shades of blue, green, rose, pink, yellow, and couched gold threads. Borders of brick red satin embroidered with floral sprays, good luck characters, dragons, and clouds. Chiefly satin stitch. Lining of rose-red silk of cloud design.
title: Taoist robe
